description: Format all files in a directory using the default formatter.
config.title: Format Directory
config.excludePatterns.description: Glob patterns to exclude from formatting.
config.concurrencyLimit.description: Number of files to format concurrently.
config.maxFileSize.description: Maximum file size in bytes to format (0 for no limit).
config.logLevel.description: Log level for the output channel.
config.openOutputAfterFormat.description: Open output channel after formatting is complete.
config.preview.description: Show a preview of changes before applying them.
config.formatterPriority.description: Map language IDs to extension IDs for specific formatters (e.g., "json": "esbenp.prettier-vscode").
